system.description: In place of attacking, a leucrotta can use its supernatural mimicry ability to call out to a target within far range that is unaware of the leucrottaâ€™s presence. If the target fails a DC 14 CHA save, it becomes mesmerized and can take no other actions except for approaching the sound of the voice. This effect ends after [[/r 1d4]] rounds or if the leucrotta attacks the target.
